sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { BarChart3, PieChart, TrendingUp, Download, Calendar, Filter, FileText, Users, DollarSign } from 'lucide-react'; const Reports = () => { const [reportType, setReportType] = useState('overview'); const [dateRange, setDateRange] = useState('monthly'); const [selectedScheme, setSelectedScheme] = useState('all'); const reportTypes = [ { id: 'overview', name: 'Overview Report', icon: BarChart3 }, { id: 'financial', name: 'Financial Report', icon: DollarSign }, { id: 'beneficiary', name: 'Beneficiary Report', icon: Users }, { id: 'audit', name: 'Audit Report', icon: FileText } ]; const schemes = ['All Schemes', 'Pre-Matric Scholarship', 'Post-Matric Scholarship', 'Skill Development Program', 'Self Employment Scheme']; const overviewData = { totalBeneficiaries: 12847, totalSchemes: 24, totalBudget: 25000000, utilizedBudget: 21500000, completedAudits: 156, pendingAudits: 23 }; const schemePerformance = [ { name: 'Pre-Matric Scholarship', beneficiaries: 4250, budget: 5000000, utilization: 84, completion: 78 }, { name: 'Post-Matric Scholarship', beneficiaries: 3200, budget: 8000000, utilization: 89, completion: 89 }, { name: 'Skill Development', beneficiaries: 1800, budget: 3500000, utilization: 80, completion: 92 }, { name: 'Self Employment', beneficiaries: 950, budget: 6000000, utilization: 75, completion: 86 } ]; const monthlyTrends = [ { month: 'Jan', beneficiaries: 1200, budget: 2100000, audits: 12 }, { month: 'Feb', beneficiaries: 1350, budget: 2300000, audits: 15 }, { month: 'Mar', beneficiaries: 1180, budget: 2000000, audits: 11 }, { month: 'Apr', beneficiaries: 1420, budget: 2500000, audits: 18 }, { month: 'May', beneficiaries: 1380, budget: 2400000, audits: 16 }, { month: 'Jun', beneficiaries: 1500, budget: 2600000, audits: 20 } ]; const categoryDistribution = [ { category: 'Muslim', count: 7850, percentage: 61 }, { category: 'Christian', count: 2950, percentage: 23 }, { category: 'Sikh', count: 1280, percentage: 10 }, { category: 'Buddhist', count: 520, percentage: 4 }, { category: 'Others', count: 247, percentage: 2 } ]; const auditFindings = [ { type: 'Compliance Issues', count: 8, severity: 'medium' }, { type: 'Documentation Gaps', count: 15, severity: 'low' }, { type: 'Financial Irregularities', count: 3, severity: 'high' }, { type: 'Process Improvements', count: 22, severity: 'low' } ]; const getSeverityColor = (severity) => { switch (severity) { case 'high': return 'bg-red-100 text-red-800'; case 'medium': return 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800'; case 'low': return 'bg-green-100 text-green-800'; default: return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'; } }; const generateReport = () => { alert(`Generating ${reportTypes.find(r => r.id === reportType)?.name} for ${dateRange} period...`); }; const exportReport = (format) => { alert(`Exporting report as ${format.toUpperCase()}...`); }; return (
{/* Header */}

Reports & Analytics

Generate comprehensive reports and analyze scheme performance

{/* Report Configuration */}

Report Configuration

{/* Key Metrics */}

Total Beneficiaries

{overviewData.totalBeneficiaries.toLocaleString()}

Active Schemes

{overviewData.totalSchemes}

Total Budget

₹{(overviewData.totalBudget / 10000000).toFixed(1)}Cr

Utilization

{Math.round((overviewData.utilizedBudget / overviewData.totalBudget) * 100)}%

Completed Audits

{overviewData.completedAudits}

Pending Audits

{overviewData.pendingAudits}

{/* Scheme Performance */}

Scheme Performance

{schemePerformance.map((scheme, index) => (

{scheme.name}

{scheme.beneficiaries.toLocaleString()} beneficiaries
Budget: ₹{(scheme.budget / 1000000).toFixed(1)}M
Utilization: {scheme.utilization}%
Completion: {scheme.completion}%
))}
{/* Category Distribution */}

Beneficiary Distribution by Category

{categoryDistribution.map((category, index) => (
{category.category}
{category.count.toLocaleString()} {category.percentage}%
))}
{categoryDistribution.map((category, index) => (
))}
{/* Monthly Trends */}

Monthly Trends

{monthlyTrends.map((trend, index) => ( ))}
Month New Beneficiaries Budget Allocated Audits Completed Trend
{trend.month} {trend.beneficiaries.toLocaleString()} ₹{(trend.budget / 1000000).toFixed(1)}M {trend.audits} 0 && trend.beneficiaries > monthlyTrends[index - 1].beneficiaries ? 'text-green-500' : 'text-red-500' }`} />
{/* Audit Findings */}

Recent Audit Findings

{auditFindings.map((finding, index) => (

{finding.type}

{finding.severity}

{finding.count}

findings

))}
{/* Export Options */}

Export Report

); }; export default Reports;
